data.text:
Arizona's Sports Station is an Arizona sports fans' place for the most in-depth coverage on their favorite teams. Arizona Sports is the flagship station for the Arizona Cardinals, Arizona Coyotes, Arizona Diamondbacks, Phoenix Suns and Arizona State Sun Devils. Listen to live talk shows, get podcasts, on-demand segments and interviews and read the latest on ArizonaSports.com.

Arizona Sports always keeps you informed with the latest news on the teams. The biggest decision makers and sports stars can be heard here.

LISTEN LIVE

Listen to your favorite Arizona sports radio station on the go, in the palm of your hand. Listen for free, anytime of day with crystal clear audio quality.

Live stream games from the Arizona Cardinals, Arizona Coyotes, Arizona Diamondbacks, Phoenix Suns, and Arizona State Sun Devils.*

LISTEN ON-DEMAND

Never miss an Arizona Sports show with podcasts from all your favorite hosts: Bickley & Marotta 6-10 a.m., Wolf & Luke 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. and Burns & Gambo 2-6 p.m. Pick up where you left off and share highlights and episodes with your friends.

NEWS

Get the latest Arizona Sports news from ArizonaSports.com. Stay up to date with breaking news and get inside analysis from experts on the game.

TEAMS

Browse podcasts and news by teams with coverage of Arizona Cardinals, Arizona Coyotes, Arizona Diamondbacks, Phoenix Suns, and Arizona State Sun Devils. Commentary from Arizona Sports hosts and interviews with players, coaches, and newsmakers.

INTERACT

Connect with the shows live on-air via text, email, and social media. Get breaking sports news alerts via push notifications and in-app messaging. Share your love for Arizona teams with others who share your same passion.

Join our community!

Facebook: /ArizonaSports

Instagram: @arizsports

Twitter: @AZSports

YouTube: /ArizonaSports987

Website: arizonasports.com

About Bonneville

Bonneville Phoenix is part of the Bonneville International family, which is an integrated media and marketing solutions company dedicated to building up, connecting, informing and celebrating families and communities. Founded in 1964, Bonneville currently operates radio and TV stations, local websites, chart topping podcasts and other digital distribution assets in six western U.S. markets. Headquartered in Salt Lake City, Bonneville is a subsidiary of Deseret Management Corporation (DMC), a for-profit arm of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Visit https://bonneville.com/ to learn more. For a full list of our markets and digital assets, please visit https://bonneville.com/markets/

Terms of use: https://arizonasports.com/story/219704/terms-of-use/

*League restrictions may prevent Arizona Sports from streaming outside of the greater Phoenix area. Geofencing is based on user IP.
